<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 2"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Necklace of Knives](/Equipment.aspx?ID=572)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Conjuration" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=33" />
<trait label="Invested" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=98" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Gods & Magic](/Sources.aspx?ID=17) pg. 123 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Price** 25 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** worn

</row>

**Access** follower of  Pharasma 

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

This necklace strung with miniature stone throwing knives. As long as you wear it, you are never without a weapon, a crude surgical tool, or stake for a vampire, if necessary in following Pharasma’s teachings.

<document level="2" id="action-359" />

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
